mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg_record( userId, `from`, `type`, content, createDate, lastEditData, createUser, lastEditUser ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{from}, #{type}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{lastEditData}, #{createUser}, #{lastEditUser} );
mapper.select: ( SELECT id, userId, `from`, `type`, content, createDate, lastEditData, createUser, lastEditUser FROM msg_record WHERE userId = #{userId} AND `from` = #{from} AND id >= #{limitId} ) UNION( SELECT id, userId, `from`, `type`, content, createDate, lastEditData, createUser, lastEditUser FROM msg_record WHERE userId = #{from} AND `from` = #{userId} AND id >= #{limitId} ) ORDER BY lastEditData LIMIT #{limit}
